lines.speaker: Camarade
text: You mission is to steal what the eye is guarding below itselfwithout being seen.
The eye is a powerful guardian that can spot you from afar.
Its vision is represented by the light cone around it.
If you enter this cone, the eye will see you and the mission will fail.

lines.speaker: Camarade
text: You have one minute to sneak past the eye and reach the treasure below it.
Use everything you've learned so far to avoid being seen.
The timer starts as soon as you move your first leg. Good luck!
